016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.builders.With;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Attributes;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Link;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Links;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Meta;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.ResourceObject;
025
026import java.net.URI;
027import java.net.URISyntaxException;
028import java.util.Optional;
029
030public record ServiceResourceObject(ResourceObject resourceObject) {
031
032    public record Builder(ResourceObject.Builder builder, Links.Builder links,
033                          Attributes.Builder attributes, URI baseServerUri)
034            implements With<Builder> {
035
036        public Builder(InstanceConfiguration configuration, String serviceType) {
037            this(new ResourceObject.Builder(serviceType, configuration.getId()), new Links.Builder(), new Attributes.Builder(), configuration.getURI());
038        }
039
040        public Builder version(String v) {
041            attributes.attribute("version", v);
042            return this;
043        }
044
045        public Builder attribute(String name, Object value) {
046            attributes.attribute(name, value);
047            return this;
048        }
049
050        public Builder api(String rel, String path) {
051            URI resolvedUri;
052            try {
053                resolvedUri = new URI(
054                        baseServerUri.getScheme(),
055                        baseServerUri.getUserInfo(),
056                        baseServerUri.getHost(),
057                        baseServerUri.getPort(),
058                        path.startsWith("/") ? path : "/" + path,
059                        baseServerUri.getQuery(),
060                        baseServerUri.getFragment()
061                );
062            } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
063                throw new RuntimeException(e);
064            }
065            links.link(rel, resolvedUri);
066
067            return this;
068        }
069
070        public Builder websocket(String rel, String path) {
071            URI resolvedUri;
072            try {
073                resolvedUri = new URI(
074                        baseServerUri.getScheme().equals("https") ? "wss" : "ws",
075                        baseServerUri.getUserInfo(),
076                        baseServerUri.getHost(),
077                        baseServerUri.getPort(),
078                        path.startsWith("/") ? path : "/" + path,
079                        baseServerUri.getQuery(),
080                        baseServerUri.getFragment()
081                );
082            } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
083                throw new RuntimeException(e);
084            }
085            links.link(rel, resolvedUri);
086            return this;
087        }
088
089        public Builder publisher(String streamName) {
090            URI resolvedUri;
091            try {
092                resolvedUri = new URI(
093                        baseServerUri.getScheme().equals("https") ? "wss" : "ws",
094                        baseServerUri.getUserInfo(),
095                        baseServerUri.getHost(),
096                        baseServerUri.getPort(),
097                        "/streams/publishers/"+streamName,
098                        baseServerUri.getQuery(),
099                        baseServerUri.getFragment()
100                );
101            } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
102                throw new RuntimeException(e);
103            }
104            links.link(streamName+" publisher", resolvedUri);
105            return this;
106        }
107
108        public Builder subscriber(String streamName) {
109            URI resolvedUri;
110            try {
111                resolvedUri = new URI(
112                        baseServerUri.getScheme().equals("https") ? "wss" : "ws",
113                        baseServerUri.getUserInfo(),
114                        baseServerUri.getHost(),
115                        baseServerUri.getPort(),
116                        "/streams/subscribers/"+streamName,
117                        baseServerUri.getQuery(),
118                        baseServerUri.getFragment()
119                );
120            } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
121                throw new RuntimeException(e);
122            }
123            links.link(streamName+" subscriber", resolvedUri);
124            return this;
125        }
126
127        public ServiceResourceObject build() {
128            return new ServiceResourceObject(builder
129                    .attributes(attributes.build())
130                    .links(links.build()).build());
131        }
132    }
133
134    public ServiceIdentifier getServiceIdentifier() {
135        return new ServiceIdentifier(resourceObject.getType(), resourceObject.getId());
136    }
137
138    public String getServerId() {
139        return resourceObject.getId();
140    }
141
142    public String getVersion() {
143        return resourceObject().getAttributes().getString("version").orElse(null);
144    }
145
146    public ServiceAttributes getAttributes() {
147        return new ServiceAttributes(resourceObject.getAttributes());
148    }
149
150    public Optional<Link> getLinkByRel(String rel) {
151        return resourceObject().getLinks().getByRel(rel);
152    }
153}
